query:
SELECT
            (
                SELECT COUNT(*)
                FROM tickets
                WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day'
            ) AS "daily_tickets!",
            COUNT(*) AS "tickets_count!",
            CASE
                WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0
                ELSE (
                    SELECT COUNT(*)
                    FROM tickets
                    WHERE status = $1
                )::float / COUNT(*)::float
            END AS "percent_of_closed!: f32"
            FROM tickets
